Assignments
COSC A319 Internet Technologies
(Fall 2020)

There are 7 6 assignments in this course. Each one is focused on specific elements of course content or of the JavaScript language. Several class periods will be used for demonstration of the concepts covered here

  • ASSIGNMENT A1 - Basic (Synchronous) JavaScript: Ethernet Frame Data Parser
    Start: Tue, Sep 8, 2020; Due: Thu, Sep 10, 2020
  • ASSIGNMENT A2 - Asynchronous JavaScript: Ethernet Frame Data Parser
    Start: Thu, Sep 10, 2020; Due: Thu, Sep 17, 2020
  • ASSIGNMENT A3 - JavaScript in the Browser: Dynamic Web Page
    Start: Tue, Oct 6, 2020; Due: Tue, Oct 13, 2020
  • ASSIGNMENT A4 - UDP Packet Parser
    Start: Thu, Oct 15, 2020; Due: Thu, Oct 22, 2020
  • ASSIGNMENT A5 - TCP Packet Parser
    Start: Tue Nov 3, 2020; Due: Thu, Nov 12, 2020
  • ASSIGNMENT A6 - IP Address Subnetter/Supernetter
    Start: Tue, Nov 17, 2020; Due: Thu, Dec 3, 2020
  • ASSIGNMENT A7 - IP Packet Parser (coming soonâ€¦)
    Start: Thu, Nov 19, 2020; Due: Thu, Dec 3, 2020
